title: DJ Sessions: Jazz That's Unearthed And Reinvented
teaser: Bo Leibowitz of KCRW shares sounds from a newly discovered recording of John Coltrane, to a new take on a Duke Ellington standard.
contentencoded:
In this installment of DJ Sessions, Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson speaks with Bo Leibowitz, a jazz DJ at KCRW in Santa Monica, California. He shares sounds from a newly discovered recording of John Coltrane, to a new take on a Duke Ellington standard.

  • See more DJ Sessions

Note: We have a Spotify playlist for our weekly DJ Sessions segment! The playlist is updated each week with new songs. Spotify is free to use, but requires a login.

Songs In This Segment

  • John Coltrane, “My Favorite Things”
  • Chick Corea Trio, “Recorda Me”
  • Akua Dixon, “Freedom” by Duke Ellington
  • Melissa Stylianou, “I Wish I Knew” written by Harry Warren
  • Carl Saunders, “Bumble Bee Blues” (a reinterpretation of “Flight of the Bumblebee” by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov)

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Bo Leibowitz, jazz DJ at KCRW in Santa Monica, Calif.
